00059 #if !defined(linear_arithmetic_error_included)
00060 #define linear_arithmetic_error_included
00061 
00062 #include <setjmp.h>
00063 
00064 /*
00065 const unsigned int overflow_error = 1;
00066 const unsigned int simplex_arithmetic_error = 2;
00067 const unsigned int user_exception_error = 4;
00068 const unsigned int parser_exception_error = 8;
00069 const unsigned int any_exception_error = ~0;
00070 */
00071 
00072 /* use gnu cpp '__FUNCTION__' extension if possible.
00073  */
00074 #if defined(__GNUC__)
00075 #define __CURRENT_FUNCTION_NAME__ __FUNCTION__
00076 #else
00077 #define __CURRENT_FUNCTION_NAME__ "<unknown>"
00078 #endif
00079 
00080 #define EXCEPTION extern const unsigned int
00081 
00082 #ifdef cygwin
00083 
00084 #define THROW(what) \
00085  (fprintf(stdout,"exception thrown %d, function %s, file %s, line %d", \
00086   what,__CURRENT_FUNCTION_NAME__,__FILE__,__LINE__))
00087 
00088 #define CATCH(what)     if (0)
00089 
00090 #define UNCATCH(what)
00091 
00092 #else
00093 
00094 
00095 #define THROW(what) \
00096    (throw_exception(what, __CURRENT_FUNCTION_NAME__, __FILE__, __LINE__))
00097 
00098 #define CATCH(what)                                                     \
00099    if (setjmp(*push_exception_on_stack(what, __CURRENT_FUNCTION_NAME__, \
00100                                      __FILE__, __LINE__)))
00101 
00102 #define UNCATCH(what)                                           \
00103      (pop_exception_from_stack(what, __CURRENT_FUNCTION_NAME__, \
00104                                __FILE__, __LINE__))
00105 
00106 #endif 
00107 
00108 #define TRY else
00109 
00110 extern unsigned int the_last_just_thrown_exception;
00111 #define RETHROW() THROW(the_last_just_thrown_exception)
